bibl.title: Postille a papiri di Caritone
bibl.seg: Fabio Vendruscolo, Postille a papiri di Caritone.

For five lacunose passages in papyri of Chariton's novel new reconstructions are proposed removing or harmonising divergences from the medieval codex unicus F, and in one case bringing out a new variant, possibly correct; two F readings confirmed by a papyrus, yet still usually emended or suspected, are defended with a different interpretation. - P. Fay. 1 (= MP3 243; LDAB 542). - P. Oxy. VII, 1019 + XLI, 2948 (= MP3 241; LDAB 541).
